"Floating Boards":
"Floating Boards are special weapons which can be summoned from Board Terminals.

Floating Boards let you move around the field at high speed, and allow you to damage enemies by crashing into them."

"While riding a Flowing Board, you have access to a number of special actions.

Photon Thruster: Gives you a brief speed boost. Recharges over time, and up to two charges can be held at once.
Photon Brake: Slows you down, making it easier to turn."

"Some devices in the field only have an effect when you touch them while on a Floating Board.

Dash Rings: Grant you a brief speed boost, and extend your riding time limit.
Jump Panels: Launches you into the air in your direction of travel."

"Your Floating Board will disappear after a set period of time, or when you move to another Section.

You can also dismiss them by selecting \"Dismount\" from your Main Palette or Action Palette."
